00029 #define UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_1(n, m, s1, s2) \
00030 catch( const sc_report& x ) \
00031 { \
00032   cout << x.what() << endl;      \
00033   handle_sc_kernel_exception_message(n, s1, s2); \
00034   return m; \
00035 } \
00036 catch( const ::std::exception& x ) \
00037 { \
00038   cout << x.what() << endl;      \
00039   handle_sc_kernel_exception_message(n, s1, s2); \
00040   return m; \
00041 } \
00042 catch( const char* s ) \
00043 { \
00044   ::std::cout << "\n" << s << ::std::endl; \
00045   handle_sc_kernel_exception_message(n, s1, s2); \
00046   return m; \
00047 } \
00048 catch( ... ) \
00049 { \
00050   ::std::cout << "\n" << "UNKNOWN EXCEPTION OCCURED" << ::std::endl; \
00051   handle_sc_kernel_exception_message(n, s1, s2); \
00052   return m; \
00053 }

00293 #define CO_SIMULATION_EXECUTE_DELTA() (CURRENT_SIMCONTEXT()->co_simulate(SC_ZERO_TIME), 1)
00294 
00295 #define ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT() \
00296     if (((unsigned) time_unit) <= ((unsigned) (sc_time_unit) SC_SEC)) { \
00297         sc_time duration = sc_time(time_value, (sc_time_unit)time_unit); \
00298         CURRENT_SIMCONTEXT()->co_simulate(duration - sc_time_stamp());  \
00299     } \
00300     else \
00301         CURRENT_SIMCONTEXT()->co_simulate(SC_ZERO_TIME);
